Text.text: A hospital management system is an element of health informatics that focuses mainly on the administrational needs of hospitals. This system is designed to manage all the aspects of a hospital’s operations such as medical and administrative services. The main functionalities of this system include entity management, bulletin management, meetings management and text management. Entity management deals with the staffs of hospital and the information related to them. Bulletin management is the functionality to provide the general notifications about the recent activities and services of the hospital. The meetings between the administrative persons or the doctors are managed by the meeting management module. The text management module is to provide communication platform for the employees of hospital. The main objective of this system is to provide the services of hospital under a single platform in centralized manner which reduces the effort and cost for the hospital information management. It is designed for the benefit of safety-critical services of the hospital.
